website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for entry-level gamers due to an impressive CPU at a reasonable price.
pros: Good price for a speedy CPU
Excellent for everyday use and decent performance with most games
Good cooling system so that it doesn’t run hot or noisy
Memory can be expanded and PCI card installed
cons: Graphics card weak for high settings in some newer games

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner PC!!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner system! I bought in order to stream on Twitch and so far the computer handles like a pro. CPU only running at 50 to 70% while playing fortnite and streaming... that's pretty good. GPU on the other hand could be better but honestly for the price it gives you game quality and meets twitch's min requirements. If you don't know anything about computers, most of the time people upgrade the GPU after they buy it anyway... I would definitely recommend this to my friends
customer_reviews.author: austin c.

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery - Essentially plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery - ordered on 2/17 - received 2/20/17. So far so good. Pretty much plug and play. However, notice it does not have WiFi. or a CD drive. Meaning, if you do not have an Ethernet connection, you wont be able to install the drivers for the WiFi adapter. But beyond that, I was ready to go after about an hour of downloading some games:) Great first gaming computer. Looking inside the case, there is room to grow too :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to operate and was delivered before the expected arrival ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son this year for Christmas and he loves it! Very easy to operate and was delivered before the expected arrival date! To say the least it made my son's Christmas! Would definitely buy from them again. Great products! Paula Hackstadt
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hackstadt

customer_reviews.title: This computer is awesome for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This computer is awesome for the buck. I bought my wife one first which is a step up from this one, but I am so impressed by this company. Works awesome straight out of the box, and came quick. The follow up after is great too, emails and contact asking about our satisfaction. Plus we got free headphones coming for each PC courtesy of CyberPower
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product I would recommend it to friends
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product I would recommend it to friends, besides there is no built in wireless WiFi sometimes if i leave it on for a really long time without using it it would crash but other than that this is an amazing product and it works really good. I also love that a mouse and a keyboard came with it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Raven Robedeau

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He absolutely loves it. He is playing games on steam with no problems. Computer is fast and graphics look good.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Sanabria

customer_reviews.title: It works like I would expect
customer_reviews.text: It works like I would expect. I'll be upgrading the graphics card in the near future though. It is the first gaming desktop I have ever owned and I will be trying to make the most of it with the resources I have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew van Winkle

customer_reviews.title: Great as a first PC can run most games very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great as a first PC can run most games very well with solid graphics and performance.Looks great,sounds great, and overall is well worth the money.My only complaint is that it has trouble running some games properly however it can be upgraded and can currently suite all my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This PC is great! It works just as expected, and is the best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I just recieved this and finished the set-up. Everything came without a problem, my only fault was that I didn't plug the vga in the right spot. I would recommend to buy this with an additional TB Hard drive and an external CD Drive.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: ... computer that I have purchased and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This is the first gaming computer that I have purchased and I am very happy with it. The specs for this computer were cutting edge a couple of years ago, but so far, it has greatly exceeded my expectation. I have not ran any games on it, but I will say I have not had a pc that started up as quickly as this one does. Plus, my kids really like the LEDs on the tower and the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ford

customer_reviews.title: I loved this PC
customer_reviews.text: I loved this PC! this was a quick buy as i am a college student and taking 3D animation classes and needed a better PC to cope with the animation software . this made learning at home more better as i could take projects from the class room back home. also the speed (not a computer geek...) was way better in general and runs smoothly in multi tasking for long periods of time when using images as reffrences.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy, I got it after I got my income since I needed a new tower I was going to spend 2 times as much if I bought the parts outright. It runs games smooth, and the astetic of the case is fantastic. 5/5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get up and running
customer_reviews.text: Works out of the box. Easy to get up and running. Quiet. Seems to have all the power I need. Was disappointed in the front cover because there was no place for a CD/DVD writer. While there were plenty of open spots in the internal bays, none of those spots allowed for access to the CD tray to eject outside of the case. I therefore couldn't port my DVD writer over from the old computer and will have to get a USB external case.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: So far this computer has been great and you definitely can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: So far this computer has been great and you definitely can’t beat the price! I’d recommend this to anyone who wants a decent gaming computer or for someone who likes to edit photos!
customer_reviews.author: brennan

customer_reviews.title: Bad Ram chip!
customer_reviews.text: Although this product does have the capability to be a good PC - I just got it back from the “fix it” store and one of the ram chips is bad - that is about $100.00 to replace. :( Not happy - of course we did not know this until after our 30 day return policy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer for the price you are paying. I purchased it for someone who is new to gaming and it works perfectly for them or a gamer on a budget. The graphics are decent, it allows you to play the newest games, but not necessarily on the highest setting. The keyboard is great, the light allows for easy typing in low light. Mouse fits nicely in the hand and moves smoothly. Overall, I would have no problem recommending this PC to someone.
customer_reviews.author: James Diffey

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and super easy to set up. I did not do the proper research and didn't realize that i needed a WiFi card. I ordered on the next day and it was super easy to install. I went on their website and found the schematics and followed up with an online chat and I was good to go. Fast system
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far a really good computer for the price. I play mostly world of tanks. I went from a laptop running 18fps on low graphics to this computer running at 60fps on medium. It works absolutely wonderful. Eventually the processor and graphics card will probably need to be upgrade but otherwise a great computer well worth the price. One very odd thing thou that happened with me is the keyboard I got had two y keys and no g key.
customer_reviews.author: pp

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I haven't even tried it yet for gaming specifically, just because I haven't had a ton of time from work and what not to start gaming. Although, I am currently downloading pubg and from reading past reviews, I am going to assume it probably wont play the smoothest with the gtx 730 which I can hopefully just upgrade it whenever I get the extra money. But so far, as a computer and web browsing it's been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler wendland

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This computer works great, very fast connection and easy to set it up in my house. It runs smoothly and relatively quiet and the mouse it comes with is just what I needed for gaming. I would highly recommend this product to anyone if it's in their price range.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P

customer_reviews.title: You will absolutely get your money's worth!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the first products that I have bought where it performed just as good as the description said it would. Even on wifi with another person streaming in the house I was able to stream and play lag free with this baby. I got exactly, if not more, than my money's worth with this. Definitely recommended for people who want to buy a well put together pc for gaming and streaming!
customer_reviews.author: Tkay

customer_reviews.title: very nice pc and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: just had to plug it in and thats it. very nice pc and easy to set up. recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jerman

customer_reviews.title: 👍😭
customer_reviews.text: Great PC! Update 2019. Great desktop computer we had a house fire and it will be sorely missed.

customer_reviews.title: Its a trash gaming pc unless youre planning on playing solitary
customer_reviews.text: Horroble gaming pc, just spend the extra 200-300 for a better quality gaming pc, this one is trash and ive been trying to resell it for the longest possible amount of time but nobody wants to buy it, ill sell to you for 1/3 of the price theyre selling it for if not 1/4th
customer_reviews.author: zack

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price not full of bloated software ...
customer_reviews.text: Great computer for the price not full of bloated software like you get on a dell or HP. It is just an entry level gaming pc but have been able to run anything I want to and the price is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin H.

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to set up and came on time
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to set up and came on time, also very nice looking and was neat and clean on the inside. I recommend buying a new graphics card if you plan on playing new titles with this, for example I have to run Skyrim special edition on lowest settings until my new msi gpu arrives. But overall great starting pc for gaming
customer_reviews.author: Maxwellsilverhammer

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived exactly as described. Computer in perfect condition. Easy setup, operational in minutes, Would recommend to everyone. If you are looking for a computer with strong performance and a modern design, look no further. This computer fills the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Williams

customer_reviews.title: I loved how fast y’all were able to give me this ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved how fast y’all were able to give me this amazing PC desktop. I’m glad I went through amazon and CyberPowerPC for my first PC setup. I’ll definitely be coming back for more
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Patent

customer_reviews.title: So far, it keeps getting a blue screen and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, it keeps getting a blue screen and major errors. Graphics card that came in it was not the one advertised. Getting ready to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Pc is amazing! Came in real fast and real easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pc is amazing ! Came in real fast and real easy to set up, if your new to PCs it comes with a packet with everything to check and make sure of . Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robertcoccia

customer_reviews.title: but they were very good about replacing it for me asap
customer_reviews.text: The first one they sent had a faulty harddrive, but they were very good about replacing it for me asap. The new one runs great so far. Decent for the price. Make sure you have ethernet cable or wireless adapter, wi-fi is not built in and no cd player.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Barrios and Erika M Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Plays great for Fortnite.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gaming computer for my son. Plays well with Fortnite. Easy to setup. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: this is an amazing computer, excellent for my games
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing computer, excellent for my games, like LoL, Don't make so much noise, and the keyboard lights are amazing, i like everything about this computer and its chip for the price, i recommend for a good experience for gaming.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer for the money

customer_reviews.title: Great computer and the price was affordable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son. He does a lot of gaming and this is a great computer.

customer_reviews.title: Great start up PC
customer_reviews.text: This PC lacks very few things for a start up. Cd rom is noticeably one, however, it is great if you dont want to run heavily graphic games and is a decent computer to first start out your stream, it does come pre built and maintains many extra slots to further upgrade your CPU and memory

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter gaming PC .. fast and reliable. Only downside the motherboard has no Bluetooth

customer_reviews.title: Its very good gaming system
customer_reviews.text: I realy like this product, its efficient affordable it has great gaming power. Very pleased with this purchase. Delivered in atimely manner. I have no complaints about this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. It had good frames in most games and showed great game play. it never failed me and worked every single time!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for a starter PC
customer_reviews.text: Great performance with affordable prices. Gets about 50 fps on Fortnite at low settings. Needs wifi adapter or ethernet but easily fixed. Graphics card is easy to upgrade too.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have asked for a smoother set up. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have asked for a smoother set up. The computer had the power cable i needed to install my graphics card, it's quiet, and I have had no problems so far at all.

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome gaming pc, has great instruction and is a very easy set up I would recommend this to anyone looking for a decent gaming machine.

customer_reviews.title: Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: This is the first gaming computer I’ve purchased & I’m really satisfied with it. The quality is really good & it was well worth the money we spent.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good price for What you get. Keyboard has a nice light to it. Packed well. NO PROBLEMS Cons: Graphics Card may need to be upgraded depending on what games you want to play. I bought this for my teenage son so I'm sure the video card will need to be updated.

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time pc buyers
customer_reviews.text: It is a very solid starting pc there is room for upgrade but it allows you to make the neccessary upgrades and for a first time user is quite capable

customer_reviews.title: I bought this computer in December 2018 as a Christmas present for my grandson

customer_reviews.text: Amazing computer! Gave me no trouble setting it up, works perfectly, and has great quality when it comes to gaming!

customer_reviews.title: Loose Hard Drive
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. But, booted up to the bios for the mother board. Kept tinking I was missing some thing easy to get it to boot up to a widows page. I finally noticed on the bios screen that no hard drive was detected. I open it up and found the hard drive loos in the case and the cable conector bracket was broken. Amazon support was great, and I am returning it.

product_meta.title: CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master GMA2600A Desktop Gaming PC (AMD Ryzen 5 1600 3.2GHz, NVIDIA GT 730 2GB, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 1TB 7200RPM HDD, Win 10 Home), Black
product_meta.description: CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Master series is a line of gaming PCs powered by AMD's newest Ryzen CPU and accompanying AM4 architecture. The Ryzen 5 CPU provides fast processing speeds with 4 cores/8 threads for effortless multi-tasking. The Gamer Master also includes the AMD Radeon or NVIDIA's GeForce series of graphics cards to deliver high frame rates and impeccable image quality in the newest PC games.
feature_bullets: System: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 3.2GHz Six-Core | AMD A320 Chipset | 8GB DDR4 | 1TB HDD | Genuine Windows 10 Home 64-bit
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 2GB Video Card | 1x VGA | 1x DVI | 1x HDMI
Connectivity: 5 x USB 3.0 | 3 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | Audio: 7.1 Channel | Keyboard and Mouse
Special feature: RGB 7 Color Gaming Keyboard
Warranty: 1 Year Parts & Labor Warranty Free Lifetime Tech Support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
